metadata.title: CVE-2021-47370 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mptcp: ensure tx skbs always have the MPTCP extDue to signed/unsigned comparison, the expression:	info->size_goal - skb->len > 0evaluates to true when the size goal is smaller than theskb size. That results in lack of tx cache refill, so thatthe skb allocated by the core TCP code lacks the requiredMPTCP skb extensions.Due to the above, syzbot is able to trigger the following
